sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; const ContactForm = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ subject: "", name: "", message: "", }) const formChanged = (event) => { console.log(event.target.value) setForm((prev) => { if (event.target.id === "Subject") { prev.subject = event.target.value; } return { subject: prev.subject, message: prev.message, name: prev.name } }) } return

{form.subject}
